mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hamilton Easter & Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Items listed on this receipt include several pieces of fabric. The receipt indicates payment of $54.47 was received by H. Easter and A. P. Taylor. The receipt indicates that Hamilton Easter & Co. occupied several premises on Baltmore Street in Baltimore.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Receipt from Hamilton Easter & Co. for Reuben, April 19, 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
